name: Tether
description:
Grab your friends, and some rocks, in Tether: the BEST multiplayer rock-climbing platformer in the world (because it's the only one. But hey it's still super fun okay?).

Take it slow and explore gyms with your friends to your hearts' contents in Just Climbing Mode, and race each other for the fastest times! Or, if you're ready for a real challenge, help Chalky the Chalk Bag return home after a long day at the office in Adventure Mode.

Key Features

  • Adventure Mode: A long challenging route suitable for 1-8 players
  • Just Climbing Mode: Groups of smaller routes suitable for 1-8 players
  • A unique and rewarding movement system to be mastered

Note: This game currently only supports online multiplayer and it does not have a public matchmaking system.
